short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters Notes by article on Instapaper's Notes Page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension which adds the functionality to filter Instapaper notes and highlights by article on Instapaper's notes page.  Includes filter by search and keyboard shortcuts to cycle through notes individually. Plus hide / unhide highlight only selections.
